channel.description: Recent content in results builders on Fresh Swift

item.title: Swift Result Builders: The Basics You Need to Know!
item.description: Officially available in Swift 5.4, Result Builders is a Swift feature that enables functions to build up a result value from a sequence of components. In this post, Lee Kah Seng teaches us how this feature works, and how we can build custom Result Builders.
